title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With the NFL draft taking place tonight, Colin believes a Deebo Samuel trade would be a great move for this one team and would make perfect sense for the 49ers as well. He claims Giannis Antetokounmpo is clearly the best player in the NBA and it's not close. He also puts the Cowboys under the spotlight before tonight's draft and why Jerry Jones wants to win the night and make a big move. Plus, NFL Network analyst Daniel Jeremiah joins the show to defend Aidan Hutchinson as the top player in the draft. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
